code: import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{selectProjects}from"../features/projectsSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Projects(){var projects=useSelector(selectProjects);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects",children:projects.map(function(project){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"singleProject",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:project.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{action:project.repo,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"See this repo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{width:"700",height:"394",src:project.video,title:"YouTube video player",frameborder:"0",allow:"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture",allowfullscreen:true})]});})});}export default Projects;
